verbose_text: While the absence of TYROBP in the APP / PSEN1 did not normalize the expression of the astrocytic genes C4b and Gfap vs. WT or Tyrobp -/-, our data suggest that the absence of TYROBP in the APP / PSEN1 mouse model substantially decreases the induction of the pro inflammatory immune response observed in the brains of APP / PSEN1 mice.
evidence: expression of the astrocytic genes C4b
